IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE IVC FOUNDATION IS COMMITTED TO RAISING FUNDS TO SUPPORT THE STUDENTS OF IRVINE VALLEY COLLEGE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: PUBLIC EDUCATION AND COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION WITH THE SOUTH ORANGE COUNTY COMMUNITY COLLEGE DISTRICT BY RECEIVING CONTRIBUTIONS FROM THE PUBLIC, RAISING FUNDS AND MAKING CONTRIBUTIONS TO EDUCATIONAL AND COMMUNITY PROGRAMS OF THE DISTRICT AND BY DEVELOPING, CONDUCTING AND FINANCING PROGRAM PROJECTS DESIGNED TO BENEFIT THE STUDENTS ENROLLED AT IRVINE VALLEY COLLEGE.
IRS990.Desc: IRVINE VALLEY COLLEGE FOUNDATION HELPS TO CULTIVATE RESOURCES TO PROVIDE ACCESS TO AN EXCEPTIONAL EDUCATION AND A CARING CAMPUS COMMUNITY. IRVINE VALLEY COLLEGE FOUNDATION ASSISTS IN CAMPUS-WIDE EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS. VARIOUS CAMPUS GROUPS PROVIDED FINANCIAL SUPPORT AND SUPPORT SERVICES TO STUDENTS TO AUGMENT THE SCHOOL CURRICULUM.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION HAS ADOPTED FASB ASC TOPIC 740 THAT CLARIFIES THE ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN TAX POSITIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN ON A TAX RETURN AND PROVIDES THAT THE TAX EFFECTS FROM AN UNCERTAIN TAX POSITION CAN BE RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ONLY IF, BASED ON ITS MERITS, THE POSITION IS MORE LIKELY THAN NOT TO BE SUSTAINED ON AUDIT BY THE TAXING AUTHORITIES. MANAGEMENT BELIEVES THAT ALL TAX POSITIONS TAKEN TO DATE ARE HIGHLY CERTAIN AND, ACCORDINGLY, NO ACCOUNTING ADJUSTMENT HAS BEEN MADE TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.
SPECIAL EVENTS-DIRECT EXPENSE 92,727. CHANGES IN BENEFIT INTEREST 18,342.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: SOUTH ORANGE COUNTY COMMUNITY COLLEGE DISTRICT

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: STUDENTS APPLY TO RECEIVE SCHOLARSHIPS. THE FOUNDATION MONITORS THE FUNDS TO ENSURE THAT THEY ARE BEING SPENT ACCORDING TO DONOR INTENT.
THE NUMBER REPRESENTS THE NUMBER OF DONORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ERIC AND SYLVIA LEE ARE MARRIED

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 TAX RETURN IS REVIEWED BY THE FOUNDATION BOARD FINANCE CHAIR, FOUNDATION DIRECTOR, FOUNDATION ACCOUNTANT AND DISTRICT INTERNAL AUDITOR; ALL REVIEW THE 990 AND MAKE RECOMMENDED CHANGES TO THE FOUNDATION DIRECTOR. THE FINAL FORM 990 IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE ENTIRE BOARD OF GOVERNORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS A WRITTEN CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. THE ORGANIZATION ALSO MONITORS AND ENFORCES COMPLIANCE WITH THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORMS ARE SIGNED AND REVIEWED ANNUALLY. ANY DISCLOSURES WHICH GIVES RISE TO CONFLICT OF INTEREST IS FURTHER INVESTIGATED. THE BOARD REVIEWS ANY CONFLICTS PRESENTED BY INTERESTED PARTIES. THE CHAIRPERSON APPOINTS A DISINTERESTED PERSON OR COMMITTEE TO INVESTIGATE THE TRANSACTION IN QUESTION AND REPORTS FINDINGS TO THE BOARD. ALTERNATIVES TO THE PROPOSED TRANSACTION ARE IDENTIFIED AND COMPARED TO THE PROPOSED TRANSACTION. THE BOARD VOTES ON THE MOST BENEFICAL OPTION FOR THE ORGANIZATION. IF THE BOARD HAS REASON TO BELIEVE AN INTERESTED PERSON HAD FAILED TO DISCLOSE THE POTENTIAL CONFLICT. THE BOARD WILL INVESTIGATE FURTHER AND IF NECESSARY, TAKE APPROPRIATE DISCIPLINARY AND CORRECTIVE ACTION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY SOUTH ORANGE COUNTY COLLEGE DISTRICT'S BOARD OF TRUSTEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE DOCUMENTS ARE READILY AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST, AND ARE AVAILABLE ONLINE AT HTTPS://WWW.IVC.EDU/FOUNDATION.

OtherOrganizationName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: SOUTH ORANGE COUNTY COMMUNITY COLLEGE DISTRICT
